portfolio.title: E-commerce Site
portfolio.description: An e-commerce web app replicating Myntraâ€™s UI and features. It includes product listings, Add to cart , Remove, using React, Redux for state management, and Node or a backend. Styled with CSS, it ensures responsiveness and a smooth shopping experience.

portfolio.title: Connectify Social Media Site
portfolio.description: A React Post Creation App allows users to create and post content dynamically. It features a form to enter post details (title, description), stores data using state management (useState, useReducer), and displays posts in a list.

portfolio.title: Portfolio (This Site)
portfolio.description: A React Portfolio Website showcases personal projects, skills, etc. Built with React, CSS, it features sections like Projects, Skills, and Contact. The site is fully responsive, interactive and also includes dark mode.
